column4: I heard that Ubuntu doesn't like AMD processors...is that right?
Kalmi...I don't remember...it might have been ATI graphics cards...It was some thingy that didn't work well with Ubuntu
it's not that Ubuntu doesn't *like* ATI, it's just ATI releases rather low quality drivers
you can get a HD 3200
depends on your hardware
Never!!
try a torrent
how do I install a torrent of updates from Ubuntu's own update and install methods?
oh updates. thought you meant ISO's, have you run a speed test?
yup...I'm getting like 4mbps but like 4000 bytes through Ubuntu updates and the install options
any ideas?
have you tried a miror near you?
yes...I'm getting the same thing from all of them
do you run a firewall?
i have yet to install one
remove the us.* from your sources.list
how do i do that?
alt-f2 -> gksu gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
make a backup of sources.list first
I think I might have found a fix...I used MIT's server because I heard it was fast and bam...fast downloads
I guess a lot of the servers are just overloaded
ok, if that works for you :)
yea
thanks for your time
